Text:

cheers!
this is fucking awesome.  heavier than lead.

We'd be very grateful :D)))

thanks so much! i haven't been able to find this anywhere.. :p
i know this is probably too much to ask, but do you think you could upload whatever you have - literally, any sunn o))) you have, in flac?
All hail, Sunn O)))! Thank you, thank you and once more... thank you. I really appreciate you placing this album on here - I shall seed this for a while, for sure. Keep it metal, 'ya dig?
